title: Best Mac SSD and hard drive Prime Day deals 2025: Early discounts
description: Macworld Looking for a great deal on a new hard drive or SSD to use with your Mac? We see some great deals on storage in the Amazon Prime Day sale (running July 8 to 11), so there’s no better time to pick up a deal on some new external storage for your Mac. During Amazon Prime Day Prime subscribers can take advantage of savings. To take advantage of the deals you will need Amazon Prime (which costs $14.99/ £8.99/AUD$6.99 a month but can be canceled after 30 days). If you don’t already have a Prime membership, you can sign up for the free 30-day trial and still take advantage of the deals. The drives picked here are all chosen by our editors, who have decades of experience with Apple devices. We’ve reviewed most of the drives we recommend, and for the ones we didn’t, we referenced one of our companion sites (such as PCWorld), as well as our prior knowledge of the company. In short, we won’t tell you to buy something that’s not an actual deal. The products below are all at or near all-time lows, and we’ve selected what we think is the best configuration for each product type. We know Apple is expensive, so we’ve chosen products at prices we would be willing to pay, so you can trust that our recommendations will steer you in the right direction—and save you big bucks. Image: Foundry

Looking for a great deal on a new hard drive or SSD to use with your Mac? We see some great deals on storage in the Amazon Prime Day sale (running July 8 to 11), so there’s no better time to pick up a deal on some new external storage for your Mac.

During Amazon Prime Day Prime subscribers can take advantage of savings. To take advantage of the deals you will need Amazon Prime (which costs $14.99/ £8.99/AUD$6.99 a month but can be canceled after 30 days). If you don’t already have a Prime membership, you can sign up for the free 30-day trial and still take advantage of the deals.

The drives picked here are all chosen by our editors, who have decades of experience with Apple devices. We’ve reviewed most of the drives we recommend, and for the ones we didn’t, we referenced one of our companion sites (such as PCWorld), as well as our prior knowledge of the company. In short, we won’t tell you to buy something that’s not an actual deal. The products below are all at or near all-time lows, and we’ve selected what we think is the best configuration for each product type. We know Apple is expensive, so we’ve chosen products at prices we would be willing to pay, so you can trust that our recommendations will steer you in the right direction—and save you big bucks.

See our round-up of the Best Amazon Prime Day Apple deals for our pick of the best Prime Day deals.

Best Amazon Prime deals for SSDs and hard drives

We’re already seeing some great savings this year. Below you will find the best deals we’ve seen so far. Click on Review if you would like to read our review of the SSD or hard drive on offer or to find it in our best Mac SSDs, best Mac hard drive and best NAS drive round-ups.

Amazon Prime Day: Best Mac accessory deals

Prime Day is also a great opportunity to save some cash on some accessories for your MacBook. Perhaps you need a spare, or just beefier charger for your MacBook. Or perhaps you want a dock, a printer, or a bag. If we spot a good deal we’ll list it here.

We also have separate round-ups for the best Mac display and monitor deals of Amazon Prime Day and Best Prime Day Apple accessories deals.

  • AirTag (4-pack): $75 ($24 off, MSRP $99)

  • Magic Keyboard with Touch ID & Numeric Pad: £169.98 (£10 off, RRP £179)

Amazon Prime Day: How can I get the best deals on Mac storage and SSDs?

Once Prime Day begins, most deals will be exclusive for Prime members, so you’ll need to sign in with an active membership to purchase one of the deals. Prime memberships cost $139 / £95 annually, or $14.99 / £8.99 / AU$6.99 every month. New users can sign up for a 30-day free trial that can be canceled at any time during the trial window. As well as access to sales prices, Prime members also get free two-day shipping and access to Prime Video and all the content available on that service.
